mapper.select: SELECT b.*, c.category_id, c.parent_id, c.name as category_name, c.path FROM brand b JOIN category_brand cb ON b.brand_id = cb.brand_id JOIN category c ON c.category_id = cb.category_id WHERE b.brand_id = #{brandId}

SELECT b.brand_id, b.name, b.img_url FROM brand AS b JOIN category_brand AS cb ON b.brand_id = cb.brand_id AND cb.category_id IN (SELECT category_id FROM category WHERE parent_id IN (SELECT category_id FROM category WHERE parent_id = #{categoryId})) GROUP BY b.brand_id LIMIT 8
select brand_id, name, img_url from brand where status = 1 order by update_time desc limit 24
